data.meta_description: JAMES FRANCO is an American actor, artist, and director. Check out this post to know more about his career, relationships, brother, children, and net worth.
data.text:
The thirst of being an actor pushed James Franco to drop out of the university to follow his dream. Although he received a backlash from his parents on the decision, he was sure to pursue his dreams and took up menial jobs for his upkeep as he studied. The actor was lucky to manoeuvre into the field and became successful. Additionally, Franco went back to school and achieved even more than he had started.

James Franco is an American actor who became famous for his role in the television series Freaks and Geeks. He later got roles in films such as the Spider-Man series, Flyboys, Milk, 127 Hours, and The Disaster Artist.

Early life

The actor was born on April 19, 1978, in Palo Alto, California, U.S.A. His full name is James Edward Franco. Edward’s mother is Betsy Lou (née Verne), a children's book author and an occasional actress. His father is Douglas Eugene Franco, a Silicon Valley business entrepreneur.

James has mixed ethnicity given that his father was of Swedish ancestry, while his mother is Jewish, from a family of Russian-Jewish descent. The actor grew up in California alongside his two younger brothers, Tom Franco and Dave Franco.

He attended Palo Alto High School, where he graduated in 1996. While there, he featured in plays that prompted him to join CSSSA in 1998 for theatre studies. He later enrolled at the University of California, Los Angeles (UCLA) to pursue an English major course.

James dropped out after his first year against his parents' wishes to pursue an acting career. He then enrolled with Robert Carnegie at the Playhouse West for the course.

Later education

When he became stable, Franco went back to school to quench his education thirst. He re-enrolled at UCLA as a creative writing major in 2006. He took an accelerated course load as he continued with his career. The degree took him two years to complete, and he graduated with a G.P.A. of 3.5/4.

In 2008, the actor moved to New York and enrolled at Columbia University to pursue a Master of Fine Arts. At the same time, he attended New York University's Tisch School of the Arts for filmmaking. In addition, he enrolled on a course in fiction writing at Brooklyn College and studied poetry at Warren Wilson College in North Carolina.

In 2010, he joined Yale University to pursue a PhD in English. The same year, Franco earned his M.F.A. from Columbia. In 2011, he completed his master's degree in filmmaking at New York University.

Career

James Franco started his career life after dropping from the University of California when he took up a late-night job at McDonald's to support himself because his parents became hesitant after he dropped from school. The actor's training took 15 months, after which he began auditioning in Los Angeles.

The 44-year-old was lucky to get his first paying job, a television commercial for Pizza Hut featuring a dancing Elvis Presley. The actor continued to appear in commercials until his first break in 1999. After that, Jimmy was featured in a leading role on N.B.C.'s television series, Freaks and Geeks.

The series was short-lived but well-reviewed. It ran for 18 episodes and was cancelled due to low viewership. Fortunately, the show became a cult hit among audiences. James got his official film debut with Never Been Kissed. Later he played the popular jock Chris in Whatever It Takes (2000), a remake of the 1897 play Cyrano de Bergerac.

In 2001, Franco's standout title performance in 2001's T.N.T. cable biopic James Dean made critics note of his talent. The role made him occupied to the point of living a private life away from family and girlfriend. It was, however, rewarding as it earned him the Golden Globe award in 2002 and nominations for an Emmy Award and a Screen Actors Guild Award (S.A.G.).

James Franco’s wife and children

James met co-star Marla Sokoloffon on Whatever It Takes film set in 1999. The duo fell in love and started dating. The relationship, however, lasted for only five years. After the break-up, Franco got into a relationship with actress Ahna O'Reilly until 2011. Their separation was to allow Franco to continue with his education.

After a few years, James Franco started dating Isabel Pakzad in November 2017. James and Isabel are still in a relationship. Despite being in different relationships, James did not marry any of the ladies, and neither did he sire a child with either.

Amber Heard's relationship and other allegations

James Franco and Amber Heard were next-door neighbours. John Depp (Amber's ex-husband) accused her of cheating on him with Franco. However, Amber came out and declared that their relationship was purely platonic. James has had multiple sexual harassment allegations against women.

He was first accused of trying to woe a seventeen-year-old girl into a relationship and meeting him in a hotel. Moreover, he has faced multiple allegations of sexual misconduct, from actress Ally Sheedy, former girlfriend Violet Pansy, and multiple women who previously either studied acting under Franco or were being mentored by him.

James Franco’s net worth

James has worked as an actor, director, screenwriter, film producer, artist, and poet. Through these ventures, the celebrity has accumulated decent wealth. According to Celebrity Net Worth, Franco's net worth is $30 million as of 2022.

James Franco’s fast facts

Why are James Franco and Johnny Depp in a case? Johnny Depp accused James of being in a relationship with his ex-wife Amber Heard.

What were James Franco’s comments on Amber Heard's ongoing trial? He wanted his testimonies to be kept private.

What does James Franco have a PhD in? He has a PhD in English from Yale University.

Who are James Franco’s brothers? His brothers are Tom Franco and Dave Franco.

What is James Franco’s net worth? His net worth is estimated to be around $30 million as of 2022.

Who is James Franco’s wife? Franco is currently not married. However, he is in a relationship with Isabel Pakzad.

James Franco is a successful American icon who has beaten all odds to remain on top. He has attained more book knowledge by pursuing different courses as he continued with his career. Although he has faced many allegations, the actor has not stopped what he likes most, acting.
